name: Mornings of a Seventeen Year Old-Girl
name_original: Mornings of a Seventeen Year Old-Girl
description:
A realistic teenage dress-up game about an endless nightmare of feeling like a freak monster every time you look in the mirror. Originally made for Ludum Dare #33, also an entry in #femijam.

Hint: there are clothes on the left!

Music: "Mario Would Be Better If He Had Parkinsons" by DFerociousbeast
Font: "Complete in Him" by Kimberly Geswein
Sounds: g_lowing, JamesMontour (freesound.org)
